# Background
![not ready ](./assets/underConstruction.png)


## What is Open Data Cube

[What is ODC?](https://medium.com/opendatacube/what-is-open-data-cube-805af60820d7)

### Web Page
[https://www.opendatacube.org/](https://www.opendatacube.org/)

## OPEN Data Cube is a PANGEO

[PANGEO and ODC Share a reference architecture](https://pangeo.io/architecture.html)

### Github
[github.com/opendatacube/datacube-core](https://github.com/opendatacube/datacube-core)


### ODC ReadTheDocs
[ODC Read the Docs](https://datacube-core.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)


### Countries using Open Data Cube

[Digital Earth AFRICA - AFRICA](http://www.ga.gov.au/digitalearthafrica)
[africa-regional-data](http://www.data4sdgs.org/initiatives/africa-regional-data-cube)
[Trevor's Intro to Digital Earth Australia](https://www.youtube.com/watch?time_continue=9&v=sTqUZshzlzg)


[Other Countries here - the Swiss](https://datacube-core.readthedocs.io/en/latest/user/deployments.html#digital-earth-africa)


## Demos

## Geoscience Australia


### Presentation slides:

[David Gavin Presentation ](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1HEPmtoRQpAgAAfpgYzr7Auz6OiOdt9he2MpOk95fYY0/edit?usp=sharing)

 

### Our Fractional Cover processing workflow (high level):

[Fractional Cover workflow](https://docs.google.com/drawings/d/1bs630EcpX5ADON5FdMtmf4XpbJqFJbqWjOm_kf9qd0s/edit?usp=sharing)


### Cubedash:

[Cubedash ls8 nbart scene](https://data.dea.gadevs.ga/ls8_nbart_scene)

[Cubedash ls8 nbart albers](https://data.dea.gadevs.ga/ls8_nbart_albers)


### WMS and Terria Examples:

#### Fractional cover on top of NBAR: 
[Fractional cover on top of NBAR:](http://terria-cube.terria.io/#share=s-zpuBdb47L56uMMAT6cRtPQCath8)

[Fractional Cover Product Description](https://d28rz98at9flks.cloudfront.net/79676/Fractional_Cover_FC25_v1_5.PDF)

a 25m scale fractional cover representation of the proportions of green or photosynthetic vegetation, non-photosynthetic vegetation, and bare surface cover across the Australian continent.

#### Intertidal Extents Model, Mangrove Cover and NBART Geomedian: 
[Geomedian](http://terria-cube.terria.io/#share=s-fRy46ALZHd2YCINLn5yerK2dI7o)


### Notebook video:

[Notebook Video Link](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mdSfvDdI-Uc&app=desktop)


## Sentinel Hub

[Sentinel Hub Letcher](https://apps.sentinel-hub.com/sentinel-playground/?source=S2&lat=43.84836281539449&lng=-98.10293197631836&zoom=15&preset=2_COLOR_INFRARED__VEGETATION_&layers=B01,B02,B03&maxcc=20&gain=1.0&gamma=1.0&time=2018-06-01%7C2018-12-21&atmFilter=&showDates=false)
